name: Dungeon Danger Traps
description:
Do you want to know if you are a good tomb raider? Dungeon Danger Traps will help you find out! And it will also allow you to prove everyone that you are also a first-class runner! But be careful, who knows where the road will lead if you choose the wrong path.

Leaderboards


Each race is reflected in the leaderboard and this will serve as proof of your skill!

Different ways to complete the levels


At the levels, you will meet forks, so you will have to choose which path is the best to get ahead of your rivals!


Traps


Each level is fraught with treacherous obstacles, such as stakes, darts, sliding walls and much more!

Updates


There is not a single failed level left without a record set? It doesn't matter! The levels will be constantly refilled thanks to regular updates!
